Crafting chest
Type: Container

While you were crafting your creations, you noticed this big red toolbox was suddenly next to your own tools.

Crafting chest is an openable treasury item. It can drop while doing Crafting activities, and can be obtained from some other sources. These Chests are the only way to obtain some Crafting based Equipment. They can have the odds of finding them increased with the Chest Finding equipment attribute.

Loot Tables

These are the sub-tables for the various materials, coins, and items that can come from these chests.

These treasury items take 4 independent loot rolls when they are opened.
